content: These vessels have been chartered out for 5 years at an average net rate of $26,580 per day, generating revenues of approximately $290 million. Also we have contracted 3 newbuilding Capesize vessels for an average duration of almost 5 years at a net rate of about $20,000 per day, generating approximately  in revenue. Available days increased by 27% to $14,409 compared to $11,363 for the same quarter last year. And our average time charter equivalent rate increased by 4% to $23,840 per day compared to $23,005 per day for the same period in 2021. Fleet average TCE rate increased by 6% to $23,042 per day compared to $21,709 per day for 2021. In terms of sector performance, TCE rates increased by 40% for containers to $31,358 and 37% for tankers to $21,020. Excluding one-off items, adjusted net income increased by 18% to $429.9 million.
